alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Pike; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 11:32PM EDT until May 20 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN WARRICK...SOUTHEASTERN GIBSON AND SOUTHEASTERN PIKE COUNTIES... At 1032 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Winslow to 8 miles northwest of Folsomville to near Lynnville, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fort Branch, Lynnville, Folsomville, Elberfeld, Spurgeon and Mackey. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between Mile Markers 21 and 28. Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 30 and 54. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southwestern Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
